value:
I was chosen by Lord Nergal himself!
I'm a perfect being! Entirely different
from those morph failures.

There are but two types of people
in the world. Chosen leader and
mere refuse. Which will you be?

Is there someone impeding your
progress? Would you like me to
kill them for you?

This castle will soon hold a grand
ball, you say? And many nobles will
be in attendance? Hmm...$k$pI shall make them all my prisoners!

Only the chosen few will live to see
the new world—only the perfect, like
me. I wonder...how will you fare?

I come bearing a notice. You are in
$Nf's debt...

Ahahahaa! Refuse like you only exists
to be reduced to quintessence and
consumed by those like me!

Once you've made yourself my
enemy, there is no escaping the
painful death that awaits you.

Such failure will tarnish my
reputation... A worse fate
than that of a morph...

Hah... Placing your trust in a stranger
is so utterly foolish.

Do not tell me you summoned me
simply to gawk... Why don't we skip
the formalities, then. Call me Sonia.

Ah, $Nu...$k$pHow are you? Better with me by
your side, I expect...$k$pYou know, at first I thought I might
just take your quintessence right
away, but...well... Heh, never mind.$k$pYou seem to shine in an unusual way.
Your light is both bright and dim, here
and yet somewhere else entirely...$k$pI can only assume this must be the
result of some unknown magic.$k$pWith that in mind, would you come
with me? There is someone I know
who would like to meet you.$k$pSurely he will recognize your power,
our combined perfection... Then we
will rule over the filth together.
そらっ
Silence!
きゃあっ
お前ごときが…！
Surely you jest.
You stink of failure.
Shall I judge you?
How rich!
I am...human...
Ahaha...
I am Sonia, a perfect specimen, chosen by Lord Nergal.
Ugh. Surely you know I detest that.
There are two types of people in the world. Those chosen to lead and those fit only to serve: human refuse.
Limstella was created by Lord Nergal... A morph. Nothing more than a filthy puppet.
I will take care of Eliwood and his companions. I! Sonia!
Nino? She's trash. Garbage. Human refuse.
You must become like me...a perfect specimen.
I'll take care of it.
What's that?
They won't escape.
